reviewText: When I bought this, I didn't realize that the disc format wasn't compatible with my blu-ray player. As a result, I was only able to watch the first disc, while the second one wouldn't read.
I got Downfall to play after it took awhile to load. Aftermather would not even attempt to play. Make sure you have a region free blu ray player or you will have the same results I did.
It don't work, they said tough!
